description:
Panty and Stocking shrink down and get swallowed by a boy, Chuck goes on a mind-bending, three-part adventure, and a scandalous music video featuring the Anarchy Sisters rocks the house!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inner Brief / Chuck to the Future
Inner Brief / Chuck to the Future / Chuck to the Future Part 2 / Chuck to the Future Part 3 / Help! Futari wa Angel
